Name: team_has_scrum_master
Description: Every team must have exactly one Scrum Master assigned

Name: worker_availability_not_exceeded
Description: The sum of effort from tasks assigned to a worker must not exceed their availability

Name: sprint_backlog_effort_within_velocity
Description: The total effort of tasks in a sprint backlog must not exceed the team's historical velocity

Name: feature_requires_documentation
Description: Every feature with status 'done' must have linked documentation

Name: task_assigned_to_skilled_worker
Description: A task can only be assigned to a worker who has a required skill (e.g.

Name: project_budget_not_exceeded
Description: The total cost of all resources on a project must not exceed the project budget

Name: user_story_has_acceptance_criteria
Description: No user story can be added to a sprint backlog without defined acceptance criteria

Name: minimize_context_switching
Description: Prefer assigning a worker to fewer concurrent tasks to minimize context switching (soft constraint)

Name: prefer_high_priority_features
Description: Assign resources to higher priority features first (soft constraint)
